Uses of Class
com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.OperationStatusResponse

  • Packages that use OperationStatusResponse 
    Package Description
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management
    This package contains the management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.compute
    This package contains the service management compute class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.network
    This package contains the service network management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
    com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.storage
    This package contains the storage management class, interface, and associated configuration and utility classes.
